name: Job
title: Google
Cloud
Bigtable
AppProfile
Job
description:
Job

A resource representing the long-running, asynchronous processing of an app profile create or update operation. The job can be refreshed to retrieve the app profile object once the operation has been completed.

See AppProfile#save.

examples.code:
require "google/cloud/bigtable"

bigtable = Google::Cloud::Bigtable.new

instance = bigtable.instance("my-instance")
app_profile = bigtable.instance("my-app-profile")

app_profile.description = "User data instance app profile"
routing_policy = Google::Cloud::Bigtable::AppProfile.single_cluster_routing(
  "my-cluster",
  allow_transactional_writes: true
)
app_profile.routing_policy = routing_policy

job = app_profile.save

job.done? #=> false
job.reload! # API call
job.done? #=> true

# OR
job.wait_until_done!

if job.error?
  status = job.error
else
  app_profile = job.app_profile
end

methods.name: app_profile
title: Google
Cloud
Bigtable
AppProfile
Job#app_profile
methods.description: The instance that is the object of the operation.

examples.code:
require "google/cloud/bigtable"

bigtable = Google::Cloud::Bigtable.new

instance = bigtable.instance("my-instance")
app_profile = bigtable.instance("my-app-profile")

app_profile.description = "User data instance app profile"
routing_policy = Google::Cloud::Bigtable::AppProfile.single_cluster_routing(
  "my-cluster",
  allow_transactional_writes: true
)
app_profile.routing_policy = routing_policy

job = app_profile.save

job.done? #=> false
job.reload!
job.done? #=> true

# OR
job.wait_until_done!

app_profile = job.app_profile

returns.description: The app profile instance, or nil if the operation is not complete.
